DOC.brief_summary: Our hypothesis prophylactic administration 5 day Octreotide follow EMR ampullectomy patient duodenal ampullary adenoma great equal 10mm .
DOC.brief_title: Prophylactic Octreotide Prevent Post Duodenal EMR Ampullectomy Bleeding
DOC.detailed_description: Inclusion Criteria : Duodenal ampullary adenoma great equal 10mm . Duodenal ampullary adenoma suitable endoscopic mucosal resection . Medically fit anesthesia , endoscopy , EMR Able provide Informed Consent 18 year old , male female Exclusion criterion : Duodenal ampullary adenoma < 10mm Duodenal ampullary adenoma suitable endoscopic mucosal resection Medically unfit anesthesia , endoscopy , EMR Unable provide Informed Consent Less 18 year old Allergy Octreotide
